forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 52. Northeast wind 0 to 5 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day reveals itself under a brilliant sun, light dancing off the cityscape as the air brims with a crispness that invigorates the senses. As the morning unfolds, temperatures are flirting with the mid-sixties, yet will gradually slide toward a comfortable 64 in the afternoon. A gentle northeast breeze, playfully nudging at 10 to 16 mph, brings with it the occasional gust, adding a refreshing edge to the clear skies. With no hint of fog to veil the iconic silhouettes of the Golden Gate and the towering city skyline, this moment invites you to revel in the expansive clarity.

Tonight promises a serene transition into a cooler embrace, settling at a low around 52. As the daylight wanes, the city will continue to bask in clarity, perfect for an evening stroll along the waterfront, where the soft glow of lights dances on the bay’s surface. Dressing in layers is sensible for the day ahead—perhaps a light sweater or jacket to wrap around shoulders as the sun begins its descent. Whether it’s grabbing a coffee at a sun-drenched café or wandering through the streets, today is a gentle reminder of the city’s charm, cocooned in sunlight and vibrant energy. The allure of urban discoveries awaits, urging you to breathe in the beauty of this clear November day.
